fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Redirect someone to either you or themselves at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Glaive Lord** (Requirement: Survive two attacks)
- You now kill everyone who visits you. You will shred the will of everyone you kill.
- Each night, throw a Glaive at someone. The Glaive will ricochet along the first person your target visits, then the first person that person visits, etc. It will attack either the first nonvisitor, the first person to be hit by the Glaive twice, or the last person before the Glaive would hit a Monkey.
**MOAB Domination** (Requirement: Redirect players of four different subalignments)
- You now throw a Kylie Boomerang, which instead roleblocks and attacks anyone you target.
- The Kylie will explode on impact, burning the target and everyone who visits. The burn reduces defense by one stage to a minimum of Vulnerable, taking effect the next day and lasting until the following day.
- Kylies are Astral
------------------------------------------------
- You can only choose one upgrade.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
- You will be informed when you can unlock MOAB Domination.
- Roleblock and redirect immune.
